h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
img_above_text:
# Snow Fox Questline

The Snow Fox is a character you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth: Wukong. Completing her side quest will unlock a secret boss for you to take on and a unique Curio.

## Where to Find the Snow Fox
img_below_text: To meet the fox, progress through Chapter 3 until you get to the Valley of Ectascy section, which is toward the end. You'll eventually slide down a snowy slope, and arrive at the Forest of Felicity. To the left of the Forest of Felicity Keeper's Shrine, you'll see a skeletal body slumped against a post at the start of a wooden path.
